headline: BNSF Railway Files Petition Requesting STB to Enforce, Review Union Pacific/Southern Pacific Merger Conditions From Three Decades Ago
summary: FORT WORTH, Texas, December 01, 2025--BNSF Railway today announced the Class I railroad has filed a petition with the Surface Transportation Board (STB), requesting the immediate review and enforcement of conditions imposed during the Union Pacific (UP) and Southern Pacific (SP) merger nearly 30 years ago.
